remarks: Ordering property for converse of isomorphism H. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2014.)
statement:
dihcnvord.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihcnvord.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihcnvord.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihcnvord.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihcnvord.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran I ) $.
dihcnvord.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ran I ) $.
dihcnvord $p |- ( ph -> ( ( `' I ` X ) .<_ ( `' I ` Y ) <-> X C_ Y ) ) $.
